author: SpunkyAmbassador
description:
Use your own custom cursor in your games!

Tutorial -
1. Make sure your cursor is 32x32 pixels in width and height
2. Make sure the file is a `.png` file and the name should be `cursor.png`
3. Place it in "<your-game>/resources/app/Content/Datas/Scripts/Plugins/Custom Cursor" directory
4. Profit!!!
name: Custom Cursor
